original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1036)@</color>將敵方全體傳送回據點內，並在 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(161)@</color> 秒內對全體敵方造成敵我不分的混亂狀態，同時降低所有抗性。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1036)@</color> Send all the enemies back to the base, and send them to the base in <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration (161)@</color> Causes a state of chaos for all enemies within seconds, while reducing all resistance.
